name: Mine Facility
tagline: The Facility For All Of Your Mining Needs
body:
# Welcome To Mine Facility!


If you are a mod developer the "main" file is available above.
If you are planning to edit our mod follow the terms of this [License](http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=wNTG9bTz).
The only exclusion being you are writing code that will be implemented into the overall product of Mine Facility

In a nutshell Share and Add to mod packs freely just credit me. Also If you want to modify the code the entire code does not become yours, you will however be noted as a contributor. These rules may change to make it easier for open sourcing of this project to become easier for the lot of us.

More Info To Come!!




> Downloads


[1.7.2 MineFacility 766 KB](http://adf.ly/rBDXi) Warning This Version Is Broken
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
